Class MoppyMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Class for building common MoppyMessages.

      • fromBytes

        public static MoppyMessage fromBytes(byte[] bytes)
        This method is not a recommended way to create well-structured MoppyMessages, but is available primarily for NetworkBridges to take advantage of. No validation is performed by this method!
        Parameters:
        bytes - Raw byte array for MoppyMessage
        Returns:
        A MoppyMessage containing the provided bytes.
